    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid(RectangularPlot parent,
            Grid.Orientation or,
            java.awt.Color color,
            Axis ax,
            int size)
        Add a new Grid
        Parameters:
        parent: - Parent plot
        or: - Orientation of the plot lines, either HORIZONTAL or VERTICAL
        color: - Color of the grid
        ax: - Parent Axis
        size: - Size of the grid, relative to the parent plot (0 is maximum)
